sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The gdm package contains gdm, gdm-binary, gdmXnestchooser, gdmchooser, gdmflexiserver, gdmgreeter, gdmlogin, gdmmktemp, gdmphotosetup, gdmsetup, gdmthemetester, gdm-restart, gdm-safe-restart, gdm-stop, gdmaskpass, gdmconfig, gdmopen.

sect3.title: gdm
sect3.para: gdm is a wrapper script to execute gdm-binary.
